title: Mobile-Based Self-Directed Learning Course for Foundations of Accounting

context.prior_knowledge: Holder of foundational business management knowledge
context.additional_context: Guided learning design incorporating text-diagram reconstruction activities optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners will explain key components of financial reports using at least 15 basic accounting terms
Learners can visually represent the cost allocation process in sequential steps by reconstructing provided accounting cases and diagrams.
Learners can complete a journal entry simulation with over 85% accuracy in a mobile environment.

resources: Modular set with separated accounting diagrams and text
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
